description:
Excel is a universal tool which allows you to organise data in an effective and efficient manner. Excel is used in investment banks to calculate the price of complex financial products, or in homes to track household expenses.

No matter what industry you are in, no matter what stage of life you are in, having knowledge in Excel will help you in some way. This course will enable and empower you to operate on Microsoft Excel with a high level of confidence.

Confused by the plethora of Excel courses on Udemy? Here is why you should take this course.

  • I am a professional coach with a decade of experience in training working adults in soft skills (such as leadership & effective communication) and hard skills (such as basic computer literacy & Microsoft Word/Excel)
  • My students consistently give high ratings for my course. Some of the feedback given is that my courses are "easy to follow", "delivered with high level of clarity".
  • I believe that the best way of learning is by doing - which is why I provide lots of sample data in this course and encourage my students to practice on these data
title: The Essential Guide of Microsoft Excel 2013 for Beginners
